name: One in The 2D
description:
A Local Multiplayer One in the Chamber game, but in 2D.

Controls
Player 1: 
 Left - A; Right - D; Jump - W, Space; Shoot - Left Mouse Button; Melee - Right Mouse Button

Player 2-4: 
Left/Right - Left Joystick X Axis; Jump - Left Trigger; Shoot - Right Trigger; Melee - Right Shoulder
